SELECT id, module, title, ip, type, exception, create_time FROM operate_log
module = "鉴权模块"
AND create_time >= #{req.startTime} <= #{req.endTime}
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT operate_log.id, `user`.login_code, `user`.login_name, operate_log.type, operate_log.exception, operate_log.module, operate_log.title, operate_log.ip, operate_log.create_time FROM operate_log LEFT JOIN `user` ON operate_log.user_id = `user`.id
operate_log.is_delete = 0 AND operate_log.module != "鉴权模块"
AND operate_log.create_time >= #{req.startTime} <= #{req.endTime}
ORDER BY operate_log.id DESC
